Articles.Content:
Considering now we actually have a consistent, stable and fixed tracking system for our Kerbals, why not make a new "Kerbonaut Memorial" (ala XCOM: Enemy Unknown)in the game, that has;

Name

Span of Service (Total in-game days/months/years)

Achievements (Records broken, G force, speed, distance, first to (X))

Some 'Remarks' from friends and family (Some humour, or sob comments("I always told him he'd never make it to Duna, and I was right."))
